Make a shelter: Build a shelter using natural materials such as leaves, branches, and grass. This will protect you from the sun, wind, and rain.
Use body heat: Wear layers of clothing to trap body heat and keep you warm. You can also use a blanket or jacket to help retain heat.
Find natural protection: Look for natural materials that can provide protection from the elements, such as rocks or caves.
Use fire: Build a fire to stay warm and to cook food. You can also use the fire to purify water.
Stay hydrated: Drink water from natural sources such as streams or lakes. You can also collect rainwater in a container to use later.
